bibl.title: The Statue of Philitas.
bibl.note: On the statue described in P. Mil. Vogl. VIII, 309 (= M.-P.3 1435.01; LDAB 3852), col. x, 16-25 = 63 Austin-Bastianini and Hermesianax, fr. 7, 75-78 Powell. - Pp. 110-111: critical note on P. Oxy. 2064 + L, 3548 (= M.-P.3 1489; LDAB 3989).
bibl.seg: Tsantsanoglou Kyriakos, The Statue of Philitas.

On the statue described in P. Mil. Vogl. VIII, 309 (= M.-P.3 1435.01; LDAB 3852), col. x, 16-25 = 63 Austin-Bastianini and Hermesianax, fr. 7, 75-78 Powell. - Pp. 110-111: critical note on P. Oxy. 2064 + L, 3548 (= M.-P.3 1489; LDAB 3989).
